name: BIM 360 Data Connector API
description: This repository demonstrates export requests, jobs, data list and use the data to render some dashboards.

FORGE_CLIENT_ID.description: Forge Client ID. Ensure this ID also provisions with BIM 360 account

FORGE_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your Forge app, required for 3-legged OAuth

DC_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your app to get notification of Data Connector job
